document_data.name: Olbrimsur Thunderwood
document_data.mainbody: '''Olbrimsur Thunderwood''' was a shopkeeper in [[Berdusk]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.History:
Olbrimsur once led the [[Stormriders]] adventuring band fighting many monsters and [[Zhentarim]] in the [[Sunset Mountains]]. However, a [[Red Wizard of Thay]] killed all Olbrimsur's companions.

While living in Berdusk he was known to often lead independent adventurers on expeditions to kill nearby [[giant]]s, [[goblinkin]], and other creatures considered monsters.
document_data.Activities: Olbrimsur managed the [[Thunderwood Forays]] outfitting shop. He knew the [[Far Hills]] like the corners of his own shop. He sponsored some adventurers to explore the Far Hills as scouts.
document_data.Rumors: Some said that Olbrimsur knew about a buried city in the Far Hills and he sent adventurers there to find a way to its treasures.
